caller_intent: Kenny from Travelers Office is informing Gloria that Travelers cannot add American Security Living Inc as an additional insured due to the insured's operations falling outside their underwriting appetite, and is notifying her of a policy non-renewal decision.
resolution_steps: Explained that the insured's operations (handy person/general contracting) are outside Travelers' appetite
Announced decision to decline the additional insured request and set the policy for non-renewal
Offered to send a follow-up email summarizing the conversation
Invited Gloria to reach out with further questions
knowledge_required: Travelers' underwriting guidelines for general contracting/handyman operations
Communication protocols for declining coverage requests
summary: Kenny from Travelers Office informed Gloria that they cannot add American Security Living Inc as an additional insured due to the insured's operations being outside their appetite. He also announced a policy non-renewal decision, offering to send a follow-up email and inviting further questions. Gloria acknowledged the decision and thanked him.
